title: Shift Swap Request
description: Jane Doe has requested to swap her Saturday evening shift with John Smith.

description: Stock of chicken breasts is running low. Order soon to avoid running out during service.

description: John Doe's orientation is scheduled for tomorrow at 9:00 AM.

description: The spicy tuna rolls were the top-selling dish last week. Consider preparing additional portions.
